page.title: 04Community Centre, Glanaman.
page.content: Situated near the village square, the community centre provides a focus for many members of the local community, both young and old. Groups which use the building and its amenities include the playschool, the Old Age Pensioners and the Youth Club. A recent development has been the conversion of the building nextdoor to the centre as an annexe, providing much needed extra space for the twice weekly youth meetings. Day and evening classes in adult education are also run at the centre. Subjects covered range from hobbies and interests such as keep-fit, yoga and dressmaking, to language courses and computer studies. There is also a twice-weekly library. The centre also provides a venue for the fortnightly children's and chiropody clinics.
